a.aria-label: What do I do if I think I was exposed to COVID-19? Opens in new window

h2.a: What do I do if I think I was exposed to COVID-19?

div.class: inner col col8 first last id14ad43e1-70cf-403e-b00c-a83aa554438d
inner col col8 first last idbd9bd842-82e4-470c-bead-362bd47d67c1

inner col col8 first last id1320bc6c-3156-4bf6-8ced-6ad88ee196fc

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

div.h3: You can protect your health and the health of your family by:

ul.li: Following the "Stay Home. Stay Healthy" order issued by Governor Inslee.
Washing your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
Avoid touching your eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
Covering your mouth and nose with a tissue when you cough or sneeze. Throw the tissue in the trash and wash your hands.
Cleaning and disinfecting objects and surfaces.
Staying at home and away from others if you are sick.

div.p: We continue to work with our partners to get the most up-to-date information.
